text:
Akshay Kumar Dancing With BSF Jawans Is The Sweetest Thing You'll Watch On The Internet Today!
Akshay Kumar Dancing With BSF Jawans Is The Sweetest Thing You'll Watch On The Internet Today!
When it comes to film promotions, no one does it better than Akshay Kumar. He is one of the most bankable actors today and his fans love him.
Currently, the actor is promoting his upcoming film Kesari with his co-star Parineeti Chopra. During a multi-city tour, today at the Delhi stop-over, Akshay Kumar chose to spend a day with the beloved BSF jawans.
Agencies
Akshay danced with the BSF Jawans on Sanu Kehndi, which is a popular song from his film.
Screengrab
In the video, Akshay can be seen having fun and dancing with the BSF Jawans. See the video right now.

title: Akshay Kumar Dancing With BSF Jawans Is The Sweetest Thing You'll Watch On The Internet Today!

During a multi-city tour, today at the Delhi stop-over, Akshay Kumar chose to spend a day with the beloved BSF jawans.
